post: SELECT * FROM empty_poll WHERE name = ? AND description = ? AND type = ? AND erased = FALSE
get: SELECT * FROM empty_poll WHERE erased = FALSE
getId: SELECT * FROM empty_poll WHERE idempty_poll = ? AND erased = FALSE
put: UPDATE empty_poll SET ? WHERE idempty_poll = ? AND erased = FALSE
delete: UPDATE empty_poll SET erased = TRUE WHERE idempty_poll = ? AND erased = FALSE
